HI

I looked at the pics and its clearly a fake. Its not a
Chen sword.

yu can buy the same style off ebay for any thing from 
$30 (USD) / �55 (GBP)  top range being about $100

this one is quite plain but a lot of them have some
seriously nasty koshirae

Paul





--- federico trejos <federicotrejos@...> wrote:


---------------------------------

good afternoon.

Well, I have not seen the pics. But I can tell you
there is a chinese guy whose name is Paul Chen, he is
doing katanas since a while.
Major koshirae are imiting shinto era.   He is doing
shin ken and iaitos as well.
Damn, I will like to be able to see that pics...
Just a couple of questions :  does that katana has a
comercial name ??? do you know the place that katana
was made ??? Hanwei by any chance ???

Bye
